resources.string: By continuing you accept our Privacy Policy and Term of Use

By accessing and using this mobile application, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our app.
By downloading, installing, or using the Rent My Car application, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.

a. Rent My Car grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the app for personal, non-commercial purposes.\n\nb. You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell, or exploit any portion of the app without the express written permission of Rent My Car.

a. In order to access certain features of the app, you may be required to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

b. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.
Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy [link to privacy policy] for information on how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information.
Rent My Car reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to the app at any time, without notice, for any reason, including a breach of these terms.

Rent My Car reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of the app after any changes indicates your acceptance of the modified terms.
If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at info@rentmycar.com\n\n
